name: Bookworm
text: A light & delightfully delicious meal with fresh toppings for your pizza pie to choose from. My choice was the spicy sauce, pepperoni, mushrooms, black olives with a few other garnishes for seasoning. This location is in the beautiful city of El Segundo with the storefront facing Sepulveda.

name: Rebecca Lemmon
text: I really like these types of places because I prefer a mere sprinkle of cheese on my pizza and traditional places don't seem to get it. I had the thin crust which was perfectly crispy, sausage, bacon, and black olives with regular tomato …More

name: Cooper Cowan
text: This restaurant is unquestionably one of the best place to eat in the area. Whenever I come there I am greatly pleased. They maintain their high  level service and the highest level of meals  they serve. You always win with this place. Highly  recommended.

name: Pamela Chapman
text: Excellent service from all employees. I think it was the best service I have had from any restaurant. The food was excellent as well. Also I was using a walker. They helped me with my food and held the heavy door open for me when I left.

name: K Houlihan
text: I went here over the weekend and this is the third time I have received poor customer service at this location.  I have had excellent service at other Pizza Rev locations so I thought I would give it another shot.  Everyone has an off day …More

name: Tejas Puranik
text: These guys really know how to make a GOOD fire pizza (that’s why I like going at this location). Staff is friendly but sometimes they lack cleaning the tables on time (reason for 4 stars). Free Parking available.

name: Jamal Hale
text: Really good pizza  great price with unlimited toppings

name: Sea_Bee
text: $ - Really good pizza. Pick your crust (thin), sauce (spicy red), toppings (sausage, black olives, mushrooms) and cheese (mozzarella). Watch as they place it in the oven. 5 minutes later, a pretty decent pizza. I will definitely be going back.

name: Peter K
text: Didn’t open on time. I know this will probably grind the gears of more relaxed types but I needed to eat right when they opened. There doors were locked at 1000 (per my iPhone time) so I went to Rubios Instead. If I managed this place I would open earlier to encourage people vice later to encourage waiting.

name: Randolph Mckinnon
text: Good was good and options are plenty. Service was ok, with all the pickup orders it took a couple tries to find my pie. Also, another in our party found toppings he didn't ask for on his pie. Thankfully he noticed before eating as he was allergic.

name: Andy Cheng
text: Easy free parking.  Pizza was decent.

name: Mimi Steel
text: Very good service! Pizza delicious and just enough for two. Highly recommend this location!

name: Charlie N
text: PizzaRev a good pizza at a good price. Be sure to throw a tip in the jar when you're ordering a flass of wine. When you have a layover for the night, PizzaRev is worth the trip and a glass of wine.

name: Flor Monterrosa
text: Appreciate gluten free choices. Love the active social environment and the its inclusive family setting.

name: G M
text: Love this place, it's never too crowded when I go. Feels just right. I always order a thin crust pizza and all the topping taste great. The employees are always nice and make me feel welcome.

name: Brian Smith
text: Lunch crew just didn't seem to care about anything. First guy didn't know how to spread the sauce evenly, and just gave up. Second guy started putting toppings I didn't ask for, had to ask four times to remove them. Kept trying to convince …More

name: Bryan Lopez
text: Always love coming here! Love the Dr pepper strawberry they have.

name: Omar Gonzalez
text: I have been here a handful of times. Staff has always been very friendly and helpful. The ingredients look fresh and they offer happy hour from 3pm - 6pm, which is half off beer or wine with the purchase of a pizza... Limit to one half off …More

name: thorn kelly
text: They have like a whole new staff that has no idea what they’re doing.there was only one person working and it took the poor dude forever to just get my pizza made. He just tried to charge me for a two topping because i had him cover the …More

name: Malvinder Singh
text: Liked the pizzas we ordered. Here they allow you to choose the ingredients and they guided too with their expert comments. Also the carry sauces were available; like the garlic and pepper based sauces

name: Kate Akhtar-Khavari
text: Good food but service was real slow. We went in at 11am and didn’t get out with our take out orders until 11:40! It was totally dead, only 3-4 other people came and went while we were there. They made my husbands pizza on the wrong crust …More

name: C j
text: Their vegan options are amazing. The pizza came out perfect. I would definitely come back and try it again.

name: Teaireyana Williams
text: The young man who was the cashier has amazing customer service. Tge please is clean has plenty of space and of course the pizza is good.

name: Amanda Alburez
text: nice staff! when we mentioned our pizzas were gonna be vegan they changed their gloves and even put the sauce from a squeeze bottle to avoid cross contamination! So nice!

name: Paul Brozenec
text: Fire baked, thin crust pizza at a reasonable price. Every conceivable topping. A Coke Freestyle machine. Tap beer and fine spirits. Need I say more? A little chilly; bring a sweatshirt or eat outside if you're especially sensitive.

name: Jaime c
text: It is an excellent place to eat delicious pizzas. The first quality ingredients. The service is warm and efficient. You can choose the type of bread, choose between several base pizza sauces, the type of cheese on the base, and the …More

name: gary ingraham
text: Friendly staff that creates a great pizza of your choice of topping right in front of you. Ask for your pizza to be cooked a couple of minutes longer so the crust is crispy.

name: Tzahi Carmona
text: Build your own pizza, they have gluten free option and vegan option.

name: T B
text: Pizza Rev is a quick and efficient option for getting the pizza you want and the way you want it.   You pick the toppings, the type of crust, and you even have vegan options.   Its all there.  Stack the pizza as high as you want and, within …More

name: Gilbert Dominguez
text: Great topping and a good staff

name: Javon Briggs
text: Definitely a spot worth stopping by, the food is good and well prepared, the cost is fair and it is always well organized here. Great work.

name: Jastaig Chahal
text: Super thin crust pizza that I thought at first was going to be too crispy and dry but honestly they stay appropriately soft and the ingredients are quality and flavorful. The chocolate chip cookies are bomb.

name: James Evans
text: Love the make your own pizza concept. I think it’s slightly better than Blaze. The staff can be hit or miss, but the pizza is pretty tasty. They also have $6 pizzas on Tuesdays.

name: Victoria Curtis
text: Love my pizza from here, just the way I like it.

name: Michael Jay
text: Pretty decent pizza place along the lines of Pie5, flat price for a small fixed pizza size, veg / vegan options.  Pretty good selection of toppings.  Fairly decent crust.  All in all fairly good for a chain pizza place.

name: Randall P. Bancroft
text: Made to order pizza, great personalized service.

name: Vicky Bidawat
text:
I had a good experience overall..
It's an economical place with good menu options..
You can basically craft your own pizza with any number of toppings and sauces. …More

name: Richard Lazar
text: Poorly organized. There were no utensils or napkins available. The preparer of my pizza had to ask a manager what basil was and then put clumps of garlic unevenly on my pizza so large sections had none whole other sections were overloaded. Great concept poor execution. Once was enough, I wony be back.

name: Gladys Depaulo
text: The pizza was burned,the tables were dirty and the floor no coke and orange sods was flat it was a very bad expirience.

name: greg Price
text: Delicious pizza made to order for each person. Their toppings are fresh. You tell them what you want on it then they bake it for you. All you can drink soft drinks. Handicapped parking and access with handicapped seating, public restrooms.

Loved thin crust
.... the best thin crust-pizza from other rest pizza 🍕

name: Dathan Boden
text: Good fired pizza done quick, but not the best. Reasonable for the price and would go again. 4 pizzas, 1 dessert pizza, and two drinks cost $48 (after tax) and fed 4 adults and 3 kids. Pesto sauce was put on too heavy, chicken was dry. Crust was pretty good, all other toppings were good.

name: Nipun Gupta
text: You can make your own pizzas and salads!

text:
Where should I start? Hmmmm

Ok the "kids meal" is such a waste! The pizza is so tiny!!! And they only have …More

name: David Beebe
text: Pizza is good. They also have good food handling procedures. Thanks

name: Patricia Torres
text: First off the staff was very friendly, the veggies were fresh and the price was right, what more can you ask for?

name: Yin Yin Chen
text: It used to be very good. A lot more choices. Since they change the menu, the choice is much less. They don't have low fat cheese anymore.

name: Joy Pure
text: I ordered a vegan option from my hotel. It arrived in no time and to perfection.  I had a special request that they obviously read and fulfilled... so refreshing! Will ordeer each day I am in town!

name: Dana-Maria Doherty
text: Of all the fast casual pizza restaurants, this one is my favorite.  The difference is the ingredients they use are high quality, and you can clearly taste the difference.

name: Dwayne Marcella
text: You get to make a personal pizza anyway you'd like it the staff is very friendly the pizza itself is great! If you into spicy go with the spicy marinara sauce!

name: Spyros
text: Awesome, hot, fresh pizza cooked with an open fire. Sliced and ready to eat practically as soon as you pay for it. I was honestly blown away by this place, the toppings are unlimited and there's lots to choose from. Aside from the amazing …More

name: Eric Barnhart
text: Ya got to beg for every little thing. Reall dirty inside. You feel like you my catch a dease in here. Your better off buying a 1.50 cristy pizza from walmart and microwaving a better one. This place is just out to rip you off..

text: Good pizza, however you want it.

name: Sandra Milena Sayago Peñaloza
text: Just had the most weird experience in this place, they close at 11pm, it is 10:18 and they did  not let me redeem my birthday free pizza, after we ordered and eat 4 pizzas because "they are close" really, why are you still making pizzas then?

name: Alex C
text: Pizza pizza pizza! Put some stuff on it. Whatever u like dog!

name: lorrie barbee
text: Pizza Rev Craft Your Own Pizza El Segundo located at 460 N. Sepulveda in El Segundo, Ca 90245. Open 11am - 10pm.  Great Customer Service. The food is good. You can Craft your own pizza / choose your own pizza 🍕🍕🍕 toppings. You can dine in or get it to go daily. On Tuesdays pizzas 🍕🍕🍕 are $6.99 vs. $ 8.99 daily.  I go weekly...

name: Nanetta Okonkwo
text: The topping selections are always fresh and plentiful. The staff are very welcome and accommodating. The pizzas can be customized or you can select from the menu. When air conditioning is on it's great.

text: Pizza’s are delicious and they have vegan options. Siiting area is failry small amd can get crowded during lunchtime and dinner time.

name: Kate Crisp
text: I hadn't experienced this chain before. Basically it's a 'build your own pizza' place - kind of like Subway but pizza. We arrived tired with our 2 kids after a day of non-stop plane trips. We just wanted a quick pizza before we went to bed. The pizzas were great and were cooked in a jiffy - so exactly what we wanted. would recommend.

name: CalvinAmeliaSkyla Phuong
text: Great pizza! Love the extra sauces they have to add 9n your pizza! Delicious

text: Love the pizza there!  You get to customize it to your liking and even though it's super tempting... try not to ask for a million toppings. It'll take forever to get your pie in comparison. I love the way they cook it on a Woodstone oven. Yummy!! Generally no wait excluding lunch time during no the week.

name: Sevin Dennis
text: Not bad pizza, a tad slow but if you're in no rush then it's worth it.

name: Fernando Gonzalez
text: Pizza is delicious and good customer service

text: This place has really tasty stone baked pizzas. You can't go wrong because you choose all the ingredients. They also have a  gluten free (allergy or preference) and vegan sausage options. It is to pizza what subway is to sandwiches and …More

text: Love the original thin crust and toppings to make most everyone happy.   Build your own or order one of their signature pies.   Beer,  wine and soda available.

name: Jason Shomo
text: Im not from California and this appears to be a California or west coast specific chain. But i can tell you this.... I NEED a franchise in Denver cause this place is like the Chipotle of Pizza only better.

name: Michael Thompson
text: I ordered the double dough and it was delicious.  The customer service at this location was excellent as well.  I'll definitely return.

name: David Wallis
text: Great food. Custom made pizzas with fresh ingredients on great tasting, thin crust or whatever you want. Quick and friendly service at a great price.

name: James Hunt
text: Taste was good, selection of toppings was ok but they went skimpy on the cheese! Crust was a bit too "manufactured" for my liking. Staff was friendly. Overall a good choice for lunch. With a few tweaks they'd be a 5.

text: Quick and alright.  Half price beer from 3 to 6 adds an extra point.
